long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your Browsing with Tidy Tabs! Are you overwhelmed by the chaos of too many open tabs? Tidy Tabs, an innovative Chrome extension, is here to introduce order and simplicity into your browsing life.

Automate Tab Closure: Set personalized time intervals, allowing Tidy Tabs to automatically close tabs that you're not using. This feature helps you maintain a clutter-free environment, enhancing efficiency.

Easy Access to Tabs: Enjoy immediate access to your tabs through a sleek popup window on the right or a detailed new tab list. Your tabs are neatly organized and readily accessible, ensuring you're always prepared.

Customizable Settings: Gain full control over your browsing experience with customizable settings tailored to your specific needs. Opt to disable automatic tab closure and use Tidy Tabs purely for easier access to your tabs.

Seamless Browsing Experience: Say goodbye to tab overload. With Tidy Tabs, enjoy a more organized, faster browsing experience. Access both open and previously closed tabs in a user-friendly interface, simplifying how you navigate your online space.
